marklogic.body:
Sorry Greg, but my favorites are the ones where you don't like the food at all.Â So Frosty Paws/cat ice cream and the tofurkey episodes are some of my favorites. There are plenty of other really good ones (where you actually liked the food), but those just stick out.
I don't think I'd ever seen the first episode before now because I totally don't remember the tirade of beepity beep beep beeps that you showed at the end of this episode. I just wonder how many taste buds you have Burned Off on camera for freezerburns.
